sub_title: Experienced  Business Project Manager / Product Owner  in  Payments &  Supply Chain
summary:
I'm a hands-on Project Manager / Product Owner with 20 years experience in Payments (both cash and electronic), Supply Chain Management, Business Change Management and Business Process Outsourcing. I always look from a business perspective to process improvements and changes. Team focus, short communication lines and clear reporting are in my opinion essential for the speed with which results are achieved.

My character can be described as result-oriented, analytical, pragmatic and with a good sense of humour. I am convinced that in successful projects, a methodology is important, but that people make the difference. In addition to focusing on budget, timelines and quality is my approach therefore on team development and the acquisition and retention of commitment. This makes the project result a common goal.

Success factors: 
•	Prince2
•	SCRUM

profile_positions.description:
Reset National is contracted as managing agent for all security topics at the ATM's of Geldmaat. Due to the migration of ATM's from different Banks there are 14 party's involved with the security of all ATM locations.  Through a product called Security as a Service Reset's objective is to organize a smooth transition of the ATM locations and manage all partners in efficient operational processes.

Responsibilities:
• Align processes with the 14 security partners
• Setup SLA reporting and managing performance of the security partners
• Manage the request for change process
• Back-up for the migration project manager
profile_positions.title: Contract Manager a.i. for Reset National

profile_positions.description:
Alphacomm provides an e-commerce SaaS solution with a perfect fit for sales of digital goods. As part of this solution Alphacomm offers a payment platform combined with sophisticated fraud screening that covers charge backs on fraudulent transactions.

Responsibilities:
•	Defining new features in user story's and roadmap for the payment platform
•	Applying the SCRUM processes with the development team
•	Managing operational service levels and increasing payment conversion
•	Managing and integrating external partners and payment methods
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Payments

profile_positions.description: Projective is a business, technology and innovation consulting and change firm exclusively focused on the financial industry.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
•	Delivery of service levels for iDEAL, Digitaal Incasso Machtigen and iDIN
•	Managing a team of 3 process managers
•	Generating improvements to comply to Regeling Oversight goede werking betalingsverkeer.
•	Controlled implementation of changes or improvements to the service delivered
•	Managing external supplier according to the SLA
•	Managing internal suppliers according to the OLA
profile_positions.title: Process Owner E&M Commerce for Rabobank

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
SNS Bank contracted Wincor Nixdorf as main vendor for all cash logistic and ATM maintenance services. Objective was to install a new type of ATM at SNS Bank and to migrate all cash logistics processes, Service Desk activities and hardware maintenance processes to Wincor Nixdorf. Main goal is to improve customer availability of ATM’s and lower costs for SNS Bank.

Responsibilities:
•	Alignment of processes, reporting and operational agreements with SNS Bank
•	Alignment of logistic processes with sub vendors and CIT company
•	Connection of SNS Bank systems to Wincor Nixdorf systems
•	Implementation of processes and service for 450 ATMs and 250 branch offices at Wincor Nixdorf
•	Removal of 100 ATM’s and replacement of 230 ATM’s
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Insourcing Cash Logistics for Wincor Nixdorf

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Migrate all cash logistics processes (cash in transit and ATM) from ABN AMRO and existing suppliers to GSN. GSN is a joint venture of ABN AMRO, Rabobank and ING Bank with the purpose to lower the costs of cash through combined efficiency. 

Responsibilities:
•	Align logistic processes between ABN AMRO and GSN
•	Migrate IT interfaces from existing suppliers to GSN
•	Deliver a contract between ABN AMRO and GSN 
•	Migrate cash services for all branches and ATM’s to GSN
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Cash Logistics GSN for ABN AMRO

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Due to the introduction of SEPA (IBAN) the existing service of automated telephone transfers became obsolete. A new service desk was created within PCC Operations at ABN AMRO for clients with a physical handicap who are not able to use internet banking.

Responsibilities:
•	Define processes for the department
•	Coordinate technical implementation of the supporting system
•	Coordinate training and process implementation
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Service Desk SEPA Telephone Transfers for ABN AMRO

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
For SEPA may IT changes were implemented of which some had impact on operational processes for Payment, Cash & Cards (PCC) at ABN AMRO. Also the organization of PCC Operations needed to be structured for handling SEPA payments. 

Responsibilities:
•	Align planning of IT changes with impact on PCC with Process Management
•	Delivery of the advice document for the organizational change for the works council
profile_positions.title: Project Manager SEPA Organizational Readiness for ABN AMRO

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Transfer of contracts and associated processes from ABN AMRO to GSN. GSN is a joint venture of ABN AMRO, Rabobank and ING Bank with the purpose to lower the costs of cash through combined efficiency.

Responsibilities:
•	Agreement on contract between ABN AMRO and GSN for cash logistics 
•	Transfer of contract with suppliers to GSN
•	Alignment of processes for the transfer of the As-Is situation for cash logistics
•	Consultancy for the To-Be situation
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Contract Migration Geld Service Nederland (GSN) for Abn Amro

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Insourcing at Wincor Nixdorf of the processes around monitoring and maintenance of ATMs with the goal of higher customer availability and lower costs for Rabobank.

Responsibilities:
• Alignment of processes, reporting and operational arrangements with Rabobank
• Alignment of processes with machine suppliers and CIT
• Connection of Rabobank systems with Wincor Nixdorf systems
• Implementation of processes at Wincor Nixdorf
• Conducting pilot for 500 ATMs.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Managed Repair for Wincor Nixdorf

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Implementation of the cash processes for the ING Service Points at Wincor Nixdorf with the goal of high customer availability, optimum quantity of money in circulation and a proper connection to the administration of ING.

Responsibilities:
• Alingment of cash processes, reporting and operational arrangements with ING
• Selection of subcontractors for ATM maintenance and Cash in Transit (CIT)
• Establish administrative procedures and systems for connection to ING Administration
• Establish processes for discrepancies and claims with ING
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Cash for Wincor Nixdorf

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Guarantee the continuity of service of cash to Fortis customers during and after the integration of Fortis and ABN AMRO.

Responsibilities:
• Identify "gaps" between the Fortis and ABN AMRO offer for cash
• Preparation for decision making for closing of the "gaps"
• Implementation and alignment of processes with the branch network, front and back offices of the bank
• Adaptation of the cash systems for Fortis clients
• Scenario preparation and managing the transfer of Fortis ATM's to ABN AMRO
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Cash Integration ABN AMRO

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Project Management of answering a Request for Proposal (RFP) at Wincor Nixdorf for insourcing cash processes for a major bank in the Netherlands.

Responsibilities:
• Managing the different components of the response on time and quality
• Selection of subcontractors for ATM maintenance and Cash in Transit (CIT)
• Alignment of RFP response with Dutch and German headquarters of Wincor Nixdorf
profile_positions.title: Project Manager RfP Wincor Nixdorf

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Guarantee the continuity of service of cash to  customers during and after the separation of ABN AMRO and Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS).

Responsibilities:
• Adapting systems of ABN AMRO to facilitate depostis of RBS customers
• Coordination with RBS of processes during migration (pipeline) and after migration
• Establishment of temporary and future processes within ABN AMRO Operations
• Definition of services in a Service Level Agreement (SLA)
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Cash Separation ABN AMRO

profile_positions.description: Journey around the world where I visited Malaysia, Australia, New Zealand, Fiji, North America and Chili.
profile_positions.title: Journey around the World

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Delivering a plan for the expected growth in the Department of Financial Management Europe (FME).

Responsibilities:
• Analysis of current processes in the department
• Conducting workshops with staff
• Identify quick wins in processes
• Advise on the organizational structure
profile_positions.title: Consultant ING Real Estate

profile_positions.description:
Objective: 
Within the program ProMIS (digitization of all client processes) digitalize the processes for grant applications

Responsibilities:
• Collection of the busniess requirements
• Management of the software team for the implementation of the processes in the system
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Provincie Groningen

profile_positions.description:
Objective:
Redesign of banknotes processing for recirculation according to quality requirements of the ECB and DNB.

Responsibilities:
• Alignment of requirements with banks and DNB
• Design and implementation of new processes for banknote processing
• Selection of appropriate machines
• Specification and implementation of a stock registration system
• Cost price calculation for the new service
• Delivery of new Service Level Agreements (SLAs) with customers
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Redesign Banknote Distribution

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Monitoring the quality of service Cash in Transit (CIT) and ATM-servicing (ATM)
• Tactical and operational consulting of services with clients
• Improvements in services based on customer requirements
• Implement solutions to improve quality or reduce costs
• Budget control
profile_positions.title: Product Manager ATM/CIT

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Operational management for cash centers of Brink's Netherlands in Houten and Veldhoven 
• Managing branch managers of the cash centers and operational staff (50 FTE)
profile_positions.title: Operational Manager Money Processing

profile_positions.description:
Objective:
Logistics for the conversion of the Gulden to the Euro for customers of Brink's Netherlands and ensure the issuing of euro banknotes from ATMs managed Brink's.

Responsibilities:
• Logistics planning and alignment with the planning department and the various branches
• Coordination with banks on the roadmap for the transition from ATMs
• Coordinate the implementation of the exchange
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Euro Introduction

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
• Propose and implement quality improvemens for services
• Development of new services as an extension of the portfolio
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Business Development
